mapper.select: SELECT a.id as "id", a.user_id as "userId", u.name as "userName", course_id as "courseId", c.name as "courseName", score, rank FROM attendances a JOIN users u on a.user_id = u.id JOIN courses c on a.course_id = c.id WHERE a.id = #{id}
